musicalLanguage.description: Elite Syncopations (1902) is one of Joplin's most rhythmically complex rags. The right hand weaves intricate syncopated patterns that constantly shift the accent, demanding precise coordination with the steady left-hand stride.
teachingGoals: Master complex syncopation against steady bass
Develop independence between hands at tempo
styleTips: Exaggerate the syncopated accents slightly for clarity
Left hand must be absolutely rock-steady to anchor the rhythm

measures.leftHand: F2:q A3 C4:q F2:q A3 C4:q

measures.leftHand: C3:q E4 Bb3:q F2:q A3 C4:q
